name: Black Diamond 12mm Dynex Daisy Chain
description: A nice tight weave gives these daisy chains a stiff feel, without affecting their compactability. They're durable, resist abrasion and shed water in wet or snowy situations.Made of lightweight precision bar-tacked 12mm Dynex.Daisy chains are variable length tie-offs designed to support body weight only.Not intended as part of your belay or protection system.End loops have a half twist for clean girth hitching to your harness.Strength rated to 16kN.
